name: Traps in Space
storyline:
The world is ruled by 5 circuits of powe, kept in a secure place by wises. 
In order to master the strength of the circuits of power, it is necessary to use minor circuits, scattered around the world. 
Wises are immortal. If they were to disappear, their spirit, thanks to the circuits of power, is able to create new worlds identical to theirs. 
However, their immortality, source of deep boredom, made them weaker over the years. 
One day, the inevitable happens, when Helios, a sufficiently trained agent, manages to beat 4 of the wises, in order to steal their circuits of power...
summary:
Traps in Space is a relaxing puzzle game in which you help a little astronaut save the world! 
Swipe your finger to move the astronaut and help him reach the teleporter, but beware of the traps! 
Suitable for both children and adults!
